description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Sudoku with a puzzling twist! Fit the pieces into the grid, line up the numbers to solve the sudoku. Millions of puzzle combinations and multiple difficulty levels make this game fun for everyone.
description.short: Sudoku with a puzzling twist! Fit the pieces into the grid, line up the numbers to solve the sudoku. Millions of puzzle combinations and multiple difficulty levels make this game fun for everyone.
